code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{Tooltip,Typography,Box}from"@mui/material";import Avatar from"../../../shared/components/Avatar";import InvitationDecisionButtons from"./InvitationDecisionButtons";import{connect}from"react-redux";import{getActions}from"../../../store/actions/friendsActions";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PendingInvitationsListItem=_ref=>{let{id,username,mail,acceptFriendInvitation=()=>{},rejectFriendInvitation=()=>{}}=_ref;const[buttonsDisabled,setButtonsDisabled]=useState(false);const handleAcceptInvitation=()=>{console.log(id);acceptFriendInvitation({id});setButtonsDisabled(true);};const handleRejectInvitation=()=>{console.log(id);rejectFriendInvitation({id});setButtonsDisabled(true);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{title:mail,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"100%"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{width:"100%",height:"42px",marginTop:"10px",display:"flex",alignItems:"center",justifyContent:"space-between"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Avatar,{username:username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{sx:{marginLeft:"7px",fontWeight:700,color:"#8e9297",flexGrow:1},variant:"subtitle1",children:username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InvitationDecisionButtons,{disabled:buttonsDisabled,acceptInvitationHandler:handleAcceptInvitation,rejectInvitationHandler:handleRejectInvitation})]})})});};const mapActionsToProps=dispatch=>{return{...getActions(dispatch)};};export default connect(null,mapActionsToProps)(PendingInvitationsListItem);
